page.title: 15Marldons Ring Road
page.content: In Marldon there was going to be a new ring road. We went and asked some local people what they thought of the idea. We asked, "Do you agree with the new ring road?" 11 said "No",2 said "Yes". "Do you agree with the cost?" 10 said "No." 3 said, "Yes." "Do you think it will help with businesses in Marldon?" 12 said "No". 1 said "Yes." "If you go to work do you think it will help?" 9 said "No". 3 said,"Yes." "Do you think it will ruin our countryside too much?" 2 said "No" and 11 said, "Yes". "Do you think it will prevent the accidents we have each year." 6 said "No." 7 said, "Yes". "Do you think it will make us a part of Torbay?" 13 said, "No" and none said, "Yes".
